title: Backward Design Pedagogy Application Course for Competency-Based Mathematics Skill Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (university level) and foundational problem-solving skills relevant to job roles
context.additional_context: Need to develop competencies in applying mathematics to real-world professional problems for experts in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can write three or more specific learning outcomes aligned with competency goals following a backward design model.
Learners can complete math problem-solving projects reflecting real workplace scenarios using smartphone-based tools.
Learners can propose improvement strategies through consistency analysis between the designed educational program and competency goals.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
